graph.name: Main
graph.node: if(DefenseScore < 3) fire(MakeTower) if(IMines < 1 + steps / 20 && IMines < 6) if(Workers < 3) fire(MakeWorker) if(TMines < steps * 0.05 && TMines < 3) fire(MakeTMine) if(DefenseScore > 5 + steps * 0.05 && random < 0.2) fire(Attack) if(Iron >= 10 && Titanium >= 10) fire(MakeAdvFighter) if(Iron >= 10) fire(MakeFighter)

if(DefenseScore < 3 + steps / 20) fire(MakeTower) if(Workers > 0 && IMines < 1 + steps / 20 && IMines < 6) fire(MakeIMine) if(Workers < 3) fire(MakeWorker) if(TMines < 1 + steps / 20 && TMines < 3) fire(MakeTMine) if(DefenseScore > 9 + steps / 20 && random < 0.2) fire(Attack) if(Iron >= 10 && Titanium >= 10) fire(MakeAdvFighter) if(Iron >= 10) fire(MakeFighter)

if(DefenseScore < 3 + steps / 40) fire(MakeTower) if(Workers < 3 + steps / 40) fire(MakeWorker) if(IMines < 1 + steps / 20 && IMines < 4) fire(MakeIMine) if(DefenseScore > 9 + steps / 20 && random < 0.2) fire(Attack) if(TMines < 1 + steps / 20 && TMines < 2) fire(MakeTMine) if(Iron >= 10 && Titanium >= 5 && TotalFighters > 0 && (TotalShielders / TotalFighters) < 1 / 5) fire(MakeShieldMan) if(Iron >= 10 && Titanium >= 10) fire(MakeAdvFighter) if(Iron >= 10) fire(MakeFighter)

if(DefenseScore < 3) fire(MakeTower) if(Workers < 4) fire(MakeWorker) if(IMines < 1 + steps / 80 && IMines < 4) fire(MakeIMine) if(DefenseScore > 5 + steps / 20 && random < 0.2) fire(Attack) if(TMines < steps / 40 && TMines < 2) fire(MakeTMine) if(Iron >= 10 && Titanium >= 5 && TotalFighters > 0 && (TotalShielders / TotalFighters) < 1 / 20) fire(MakeShieldMan) if(Iron >= 10 && Titanium >= 10) fire(MakeAdvFighter) if(Iron >= 10) fire(MakeFighter)
